thread.section_title: Thrift Books Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Thrift Books | www.thriftbooks.com | 168 of 3569
thread.title: Brenda

author: Brenda
title: Brenda
text:
I'm so pleased with Thrift Books! Great books in the condition stated, super fast delivery, great communication. We use most of the books purchased for homeschooling, and I found things at Thrift Books that I had been looking everywhere for.
My daughter turned me on to Thrift Books, Just wish the recommendation had given her credit.
I'll definitely return and recommend to friends and family.
